content:
IMAHOT - Maternity and Nursing-Friendly 
clothes shop IMAHOT 

 is the story of my life.
 It’s all about my pregnancy, giving birth, nursing, bringing up
 my kids and watching them grow – in a word: motherhood.My website is my closet. It’s filled with my designs and creations, brought to 
life by years of personal experience, the constant search for that
 magical combination of feeling
 comfortable while looking
 great (we all want that, right?) and the desire to share my 
 
 ideas with every woman who’s still looking.This online experience is all about being a woman, taking a break from what’s out there and strolling in a feminine world.When you explore my website, you are taking a peek into my dream – the dream of dressing you with the best and most suitable maternity clothes, the dream of creating, the dream 
of sharing, of sisterhood among women and mothers.Youare here – so browse through my life, look in my closet, let yourself feel like a true woman – 
if you find anything that makes you feel comfy and pretty, you’ll be taking part in making my dream come true.oursYifat Levi
